packOptions.releaseNotes:
3.0.0-alpha-build18 version: Fix for property names with same class name, addition of table functions for entities and repositories (read operations) and code fix for project selection extensions: use DbObject parameter instead of specific type (table, view and table function).

Quick start https://www.codeproject.com/Articles/1213355/Scaffolding-Dapper-with-CatFactory
